title: Ep. 69 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
SPONSORS: - Get 20% Off and free shipping at https://Manscaped.com/BEARS - Get 10% off your first 3 months at https://Ritual.com/BEARS - Go to https://VuoriClothing.com/BEARS and get 20% off your first purchase plus free shipping on U.S. orders over $75 - Go to https://FitVineWine.com to order online for delivery straight to your door - Head to https://Policygenius.com right now to get started. When it comes to insurance, it’s nice to get it right. - Go to https://HelloTushy.com/BEARS get 10% off your order and FREE shipping

Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer discuss FaceTime etiquette, Spanish history, Derek DelGaudio's "In & Of Itself," "ZeroZeroZero," "The Apology Line" podcast, the world's best pizza, and L.A.'s homelessness issue. They call wheelchair rugby player Mark Zupan and "Man v. Food" host Adam Richman to have them weigh in on some pressing issues.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
